laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Genetic analysis of the RET protooncogene
laboratory_examinations.findings: Mutation found at exon 15, codon 891, TCG mutated to GCG resulting in a serine to alanine amino acid change.

Mildly elevated calcitonin level of 6.1 ng/liter [6.1 pg/ml; reference range, <14.6 ng/liter ( <14.6 pg/ml)], normal serum calcium level of 2.175 mmol/liter [8.7 mg/dl; reference range, 2.1–2.55 mmol/liter ( 8.4–10.2 mg/dl)], normal PTH level of 60 ng/liter [60 pg/ml; reference range, 10–65 ng/liter (10–65 pg/ml)], normal 24-h urine levels of catecholamines and metanephrines.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: After surgery, calcitonin values remained normal with no evidence of pheochromocytoma or hyperparathyroidism after 1 yr of follow-up.
